title: Jeff Brazier and wife Kate Dwyer 'working through difficulties in marriage'
text:
Jeff Brazier and wife Kate Dwyer are ‘working through difficulties’ in their marriage (Picture: Getty)

Jeff Brazier and wife Kate Dwyer are working through ‘difficulties’ in their marriage.

The couple tied the knot last year in a lavish wedding in Portugal, surrounded by their closest friends and family, including the reality star’s two sons, Freddy and Bobby – whom he shares with the late Jade Goody.

However, just a year into their marriage, his rep has confirmed they have had ‘some difficulties’ in their relationship.

But the spokesperson is adamant there is no way they are about to call time on things.

‘There is categorically no split between Jeff and Kate,’ they told The Sun.

‘They have had some difficulties but they are doing their utmost to work through them together and will continue to do so in private.’

This may come as a shock as the couple only recently celebrated their first wedding anniversary, after their 2018 nuptials.

And the dad-of-two thanked the PR expert for ‘bringing stability’ to his life.

‘I’m so happy to marry Kate, who has brought so much stability to my life,’ he explained to Hello! Magazine.

‘This isn’t just any wedding, this is a really special one. It doesn’t just represent Kate and I putting rings on each other’s fingers. It represents the fact that we won at something really tricky. We won at becoming a family.

‘Before it was just three boys rattling around in a house on our own, trying to get through life. Then Kate came along and worked so hard at making us complete.

‘She hasn’t just completed one person, she’s completed a family and given three boys a real sense of belonging.’

While Kate added to the publication: ‘Jeff is the most amazing man I have ever met and I could not wait to be able to call him my husband.’

Metro.co.uk has contacted Jeff’s reps for a comment.
